Interface ActionsBuilderController<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionsDriverBuilder, ActionsSeleniumBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • click

        T click(Object locator)
        Clicks in the middle of the given element. Equivalent to: Actions.moveToElement(onElement).click()
        Parameters:
        locator -
        Returns:
        instance of ActionBuilder

      • mouseOver

        Parameters:
        locator -
        Returns:
        instance of ActionBuilder

      • mouseUp

        T mouseUp(KeyInfo key)
        Performs a modifier key release. Releasing a non-depressed modifier key will yield undefined behaviour.
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        instance of ActionBuilder

      • mouseDown

        T mouseDown(KeyInfo key)
        Performs a modifier key press. Does not release the modifier key - subsequent interactions may assume it's kept pressed. Note that the modifier key is never released implicitly - either keyUp(theKey) or sendKeys(Keys.NULL) must be called to release the modifier.
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        instance of ActionBuilder

      • mouseDown

        T mouseDown(Object locator,
          KeyInfo key)
        Move to element first and then perform mouseDown
        Parameters:
        locator -
        key -
        Returns:
        instance of ActionBuilder

        Parameters:

        key -
        Returns:
        instance of ActionBuilder

      • clickAndHold

        T clickAndHold(Object locator)
        Clicks (without releasing) in the middle of the given element. This is equivalent to: Actions.moveToElement(onElement).clickAndHold()
        Parameters:
        locator - of WebElement to click and hold
        Returns:
        instance of ActionBuilder

    int x,
    int y)
        Tap an element, offset from upper left corner

        y - y offset
